A

Activator - Class in coloradocollege.ifroning
An activator is any object that the player can interact with that is not an item.
Activator() - Constructor for class coloradocollege.ifroning.Activator
Constructs an empty activator.
Activator(String, String, String, String, Key) - Constructor for class coloradocollege.ifroning.Activator
Constructs an activator with a given initial state, altered state, change message and key item.
ActivatorList - Class in coloradocollege.ifroning
An activator list is a list of activators stored in an array.
ActivatorList() - Constructor for class coloradocollege.ifroning.ActivatorList
Constructs an activator list.
addActivator(Activator) - Method in class coloradocollege.ifroning.ActivatorList
Adds an activator to the list.
addItem(Item) - Method in class coloradocollege.ifroning.Inventory
Adds an item to the inventory.
addNeighbor(String, Location) - Method in class coloradocollege.ifroning.Location
Adds a neighbor North, East, South, West, above or below this location.
addRequiredActivators(String, ActivatorList, String) - Method in class coloradocollege.ifroning.Location
Blocks a direction to the player and adds an activator list whose activators must all be activated in order to allow passage.
areActivated() - Method in class coloradocollege.ifroning.ActivatorList
Returns true if all of the activators in the list are activated.
